overview: A candid, unvarnished conversation on the terrace of the Institut Français in Naples with openly gay French director Vincent Dieutre (Orlando Ferito (2013), Jaurès (2012), Mon voyage d'hiver (2003) ) known for his daring experiments. From the child full of curiosity, to the young man discovering New York, Andy Warhol, drugs and punk, to festivals and international recognition.
title: Vincent Dieutre - Lo sguardo altrove
